attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from the red list or add India back to the red list
attributes.additional_details:
A very controversial political game is being played against Pakistan who have a lower infection rate in comparison to Pakistan. If Pakistan is to stay on the Red list, India should be a part of it. On what grounds has India been removed if Pakistan remains.
One of these decisions had to be taken by the UK Government in order to avoid court proceedings based on all statitstic which show this is an incorrect decision to leave Pakistan on the Red list if India is to be removed.
attributes.background: Remove Pakistan from the red list or add India back to the red list.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below two petitions we currently have open on this topic:

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974

India to be added to red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582026
